permissions: User must be authorized to update the associated job production plan (CrewRequirementPolicy#update?).
side_effects: Updates the crew requirement and may trigger job production plan recap generation after commit.
validation_notes: Requires a crew requirement ID argument. At least one attribute or relationship must be specified. --resource-classification-id requires --resource-classification-type. --resource-id requires --resource-type. --start-at and --end-at must be set together (both set or both cleared), and end_at must be after start_at when provided. --requires-inbound-movement, --requires-outbound-movement, and --is-validating-overlapping must be true or false when provided. Explicit inbound/outbound latitude and longitude must form valid coordinate pairs. --crew-requirement-credential-classifications accepts a comma-separated list; an empty value clears the relationship.

flags.name: --resource-classification-type
flags.description: Resource classification type (JSON:API type, e.g., labor-classifications)

flags.name: --resource-type
flags.description: Resource type (JSON:API type, e.g., laborers or equipment)

flags.name: --end-at
flags.validation: ISO 8601 timestamp; requires --start-at and must be after start-at.

flags.name: --mobilization-method
flags.description: Mobilization method (crew, heavy_equipment_transport, lowboy, itself, trailer)
flags.validation: One of: crew, heavy_equipment_transport, lowboy, itself, trailer.

flags.name: --crew-requirement-credential-classifications
flags.description: Comma-separated credential classification link IDs (empty clears)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of IDs; empty value clears the relationship.

flags.name: --explicit-inbound-latitude
flags.validation: Requires explicit inbound longitude and must be a valid latitude.

flags.name: --explicit-inbound-longitude
flags.validation: Requires explicit inbound latitude and must be a valid longitude.

flags.name: --explicit-outbound-latitude
flags.validation: Requires explicit outbound longitude and must be a valid latitude.

flags.name: --explicit-outbound-longitude
flags.validation: Requires explicit outbound latitude and must be a valid longitude.
